node.text: Greetings, =player.formalAddressTerm=.~ Live and drink deeply, =player.formalAddressTerm=.~ Ah, =player.formalAddressTerm=, please come in.~ My wares are borne of the finest cattle, =player.formalAddressTerm=. Care to try them?~ The kipper and I both know that the finest ingredient is time.~
